task-wr.title: Displaying Compute Node Information
task-wr.shortdesc: You can view compute node resources from the Web administration interface or the CLI. You can also view data interface assignments graphically from the Web administration interface.

context.p: US75601 added as a place to mention Provider Network Topology viewUsing the Web administration interface, you can obtain information about compute hosts in two places:

li.p: The Provider Network Topology view. This is a graphical representation of all compute nodes on the system and their data interface connections. You can select individual compute hosts to view details. You can also review active alarms for the data interface connections. For more information, see .

note.p: You cannot make changes from this view.

li.p: The Hosts tab on the Host Inventory page. This contains a list of all hosts on the system, showing their current status. You can select an individual compute host to obtain more information or to edit its resources and connection details. For more information, see .
